Instruction: Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut√© chopped onion and garlic until softened.
Add fresh spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. Drain excess liquid.
In a large bowl, combine ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Stir until well combined.

In a large baking dish, spread a thin layer of tomato sauce. Layer lasagna noodles, ricotta mixture, spinach, and mozzarella cheese. Repeat layers until all ingredients are used, ending with a layer of mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown and bubbly.
Let lasagna rest for 10 minutes before serving.
